{"global.code-snippets":"","arthur.code-snippets":"{
	"marcar horario ponto": {
		"prefix": "h",
		"body": [
			"${CLIPBOARD} - $2:$3 - $4:$5 - kopenhagen - $7"
		]
	},

	"media querie css": {
		"scope": "css",
		"prefix": "media-querie",
		"body": [
			"@media screen and (min-width: $1px) {",
			"${CLIPBOARD}",
			"}",
			"$2"
		]
	},

	"global scss": {
		"scope": "scss",
		"prefix": "global",
		"body": [
			":global(.${CLIPBOARD}){",
			"\t.$1",
			"}",
			"$2"
		]
	},

	"create color variable scss": {
		"prefix": "c",
		"body": [
			"\\$color-$1-${2:01}: ${CLIPBOARD};",
			"$3"
		],
		"description": "Create color variable"
	},


	"Wrap with React-Fragment": {
		"prefix": "rf",
		"body": [
			"<React.Fragment>${TM_SELECTED_TEXT}</React.Fragment>$1"
		],
	},

	/**
	*
	* * --- --- --- --- fontes projetos --- --- --- --- *
	*
	*/

	"sass font": {
		"scope": "scss",
		"prefix": "font-marabraz",
		"body": [
			"@include textConfigCustom(\\$color:${1:}, \\$fontSize:${2:}, \\$fontWeight:${3:}, \\$line-height:${2:});"
		],
		"description": "Gera fontes para a loja marabra"
	},

	"css font": {
		"prefix": "css-font",
		"body": [
			"font-size: ${1:}px;",
			"line-height: ${1:}px;",
			"font-weight: ${2:};",
			"color: #${3:};"
		],
		"description": "Gera fontes"
	},

	/**
	*
	* * --- --- --- --- vtex --- --- --- --- *
	*
	*/

	"media query": {
		"scope": "scss",
		"prefix": "media-querie-vtex",
		"body": [
			"@include mq('$1') {",
			"\t${CLIPBOARD}",
			"}",
			"$2"
		],
		"description": "Gera uma estrutura de media"
	},

	"generate background url": {
		"scope": "scss",
		"prefix": "vtex-url-background",
		"body": [
			"background: url(/\"${CLIPBOARD}\") center no-repeat;"
		],
		"description": "Gera uma props de url apontando para o cms da loja"
	},





	/**
	*
	* * comentarios *
	*
	*/

	"comentario fechado": {
		"prefix": "v",
		"body": [
			"[\"${1:}\"]: {",
			"href: \"${1:}\",",
			"items: [",

			"]",
			"},",
			"${2:}"
		]
	},

	"comentario aberto": {
		"prefix": "cioAberto",
		"body": [
			"/**",
			"*",
			"* * ${1:} *",
			"*",
			"*/",
			"",
			"/**",
		]
	},

	/**
	*
	* * --- --- --- --- comentarios --- --- --- --- *
	*
	*/

	/**
	*
	* * testes *
	*
	*/

	"jest describe": {
		"prefix": "jstdescribe",
		"body": [
			"describe('${1:}', () => {",
			"  test('${2:}', () => {",
			"    ${3:}",
			"  })",
			"})"
		]
	}

	/**
	*
	* * --- --- --- --- testes --- --- --- --- *
	*
	*/
	,


	/**
	*
	* * sass *
	*
	*/

	"media": {
		"prefix": "sassmediaphone",
		"body": [
			"@include media(\"${1:}\") {",
			"${2:}",
			"}"
		]
	},

	"create placeholder": {
		"prefix": "sassplaceholder",
		"body": [
			"%${1:} {",
			"  ${2:}",
			"}"
		]
	},

	"create function with arguments": {
		"prefix": "sassfunction",
		"body": [
			"@function ${{1:}(:}any: 1) {",
			" ${2:} ",
			"return",
			"}"
		]
	},

	"create mixin with arguments": {
		"prefix": "sassmixinwitharguments",
		"body": [
			"@mixin ${{1:}(:}any: 1){",
			"  ${2:}",
			"}"
		]
	},

	"create mixin without arguments": {
		"prefix": "sassmixinwitharguments",
		"body": [
			"@mixin ${1:}{",
			"  ${2:}",
			"}"
		]
	},

	"use mixin": {
		"prefix": "sassusemixin",
		"body": "@include ${1:}"
	},

	"use placeholder": {
		"prefix": "sassuseplaceholder",
		"body": "@extend ${1:}"
	}

	/**
	*
	* * --- --- --- --- sass --- --- --- --- *
	*
	*/
}","vtex-flex-layout.code-snippets":"{
	"Estrutura Flex R1": {
		"prefix": "vtex-flex-layout-r-1-row",
		"scope": "json",
		"body": [
			"  \"flex-layout.row#container--${1/[\\s]/-/g}\": {",
			"    \"props\": {",
			"      \"blockClass\": [",
			"        \"container__${1/[\\s]/-/g}-row\"",
			"      ],",
			"      \"preserveLayoutOnMobile\": true,",
			"      \"fullWidth\": true",
			"    },",

			"        \"container__${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}--${3/[\\s]/-/g}-row\",",

		"body": [

}","rich test.code-snippets":"{
	// Place your global snippets here. Each snippet is defined under a snippet name and has a scope, prefix, body and 
	// description. Add comma separated ids of the languages where the snippet is applicable in the scope field. If scope 
	// is left empty or omitted, the snippet gets applied to all languages. The prefix is what is 
	// used to trigger the snippet and the body will be expanded and inserted. Possible variables are: 
	// $1, $2 for tab stops, $0 for the final cursor position, and ${1:label}, ${2:another} for placeholders. 
	// Placeholders with the same ids are connected.
	// Example:
	// "Print to console": {
	// 	"scope": "javascript,typescript",
	// 	"prefix": "log",
	// 	"body": [
	// 		"console.log('$1');",
	// 		"$2"
	// 	],
	// 	"description": "Log output to console"
	// }
	"Rich Text S1": {
		"prefix": "vtex-rich-text-1",
		"body": [
			"  \"rich-text#text--${1/[\\s]/-/g}\": {",
			"    \"props\": {",
			"      \"text\": \"${CLIPBOARD}\",",
			"      \"blockClass\": [",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}\"",
			"      ]",
			"    }",
			"  }"
		],
		"description": ""
	},


	"Rich Text S2": {
		"prefix": "vtex-rich-text-2",
		"body": [
			"  \"rich-text#text--${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}\": {",
			"    \"props\": {",
			"      \"text\": \"${CLIPBOARD}\",",
			"      \"blockClass\": [",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}\",",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}\"",
			"      ]",
			"    }",
			"  }"
		],
		"description": ""
	},


	"Rich Text S3": {
		"prefix": "vtex-rich-text-3",
		"body": [
			"  \"rich-text#text--${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}--${3/[\\s]/-/g}\": {",
			"    \"props\": {",
			"      \"text\": \"${CLIPBOARD}\",",
			"      \"blockClass\": [",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}--${3/[\\s]/-/g}\",",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}\",",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}\"",
			"      ]",
			"    }",
			"  }"
		],
		"description": ""
	},

	"Rich Text S4": {
		"prefix": "vtex-rich-text-4",
		"body": [
			"  \"rich-text#text--${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}--${3/[\\s]/-/g}--${4/[\\s]/-/g}\": {",
			"    \"props\": {",
			"      \"text\": \"${CLIPBOARD}\",",
			"      \"blockClass\": [",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}--${3/[\\s]/-/g}--${4/[\\s]/-/g}\",",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}--${3/[\\s]/-/g}\",",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}\",",
			"        \"text__${1/[\\s]/-/g}\"",
			"      ]",
			"    }",
			"  }"
		],
		"description": ""
	},

	"Rich Text S5": {
		"prefix": "vtex-rich-text-5",
		"body": [
			"  \"rich-text#text--${1/[\\s]/-/g}--${2/[\\s]/-/g}--${3/[\\s]/-/g}--${4/[\\s]/-/g}--${5/[\\s]/-/g}\": {",
			"    \"props\": {",
			"      \"text\": \"${CLIPBOARD}\",",
